routingHeader.cementCompanyPositionOnUse: The Cement Company's Position on Using RDF

services.subtitle: There are a number of coal trading services that you can now apply for electronically

firstCard.title: Issuing a letter of no objection to shipments of coal (stone-petroleum)
firstCard.description: You can apply for this service electronically through our website

secondCard.title: Approving the environmental performance report annually
secondCard.description: You can apply for this service electronically through our website

thirdCard.title: Issuing a letter of approval to export charcoal
thirdCard.description: You can apply for this service electronically through our website

fourthCard.title: Approval to modify the quantity of an exported shipment
fourthCard.description: You can apply for this service electronically through our website

fifthCard.title: Approval to amend export ports
fifthCard.description: You can apply for this service electronically through our website

sixthCard.title: Service for requesting approval of a charcoal production model
sixthCard.description: You can apply for this service electronically through our website

aboutUs.description: Within the framework of the policy of the Ministry and the Agency to implement the state’s directives to expedite the provision of services provided to investors, and within the framework of improving the quality of services provided by the Coal Unit to encourage investment and not disrupt investors, the decision of Mr. Dr., CEO of the Agency No. (1042) was issued on 10/19/2022 to add a clause Resolution No. (185) of 2018 regulating the documentary cycle stipulates that the duration of this cycle be determined to be two working days instead of three working days, starting from the date the documents are completed and the company pays the administrative expenses and legally prescribed fees.

swiper.swiperText: An integrated system for obtaining licenses, approvals and permits for coal trading activities.

admissionSteps.title: Admission steps
admissionSteps.description: To obtain the service, follow the following steps
admissionSteps.mainText: You can now use an electronic signature during registration to ensure the integrity of the procedures

firstCard.title: 1 - Data recording
firstCard.description: The authorized person creates an account for the facility by entering the data for himself and the facility and verifying this data through the company’s electronic signature and submitting the required documents for that.

secondCard.title: 2 - Service Request
secondCard.description: After creating the account and registering the facility, the authorized person submits a request to obtain approval or license through the system.

thirdCard.title: 3 - Payment of fees
thirdCard.description: The authorized person pays the fees online through the system.

fourthCard.title: 4 - Issuing permits
fourthCard.description: The head of the agency reviews the data and issues approval or authorization through the system.

admissionForm.title: Approval for unloading on (the dock/hook), storing, handling and using coal or petroleum.
admissionForm.DestinationOfOrigin: The country of origin of coal (Place of origin)
admissionForm.portShipmentReceived: The port from which the shipment is received
admissionForm.dateOfShipment: Date of shipment (according to the bill of lading)
admissionForm.shipmentHandlingStages: Shipment handling stages (port of arrival - intermediary warehouse - company using)
admissionForm.UNLOAD_ACCEPT_PAPER: The company carrying out the unloading work
admissionForm.TRANSPORT_ACCEPT_PAPER: The company carrying out transportation work
admissionForm.provideUsWithTheFollowingDocuments: Provide us with the following documents
admissionForm.billOfLading: A certified copy of the bill of lading bearing the name and address of the company for which the coal is imported
admissionForm.partyToWhichCoalIsSupplied: A copy of the contract with the party to which the coal was supplied, including analyzes of the shipment
admissionForm.recordingShipmentData: Evidence of recording the shipment data (ship name - quantity of coal - date of arrival)
admissionForm.unloadingOnTheHook: In case of unloading on the hook or the hand of a sea
admissionForm.approvingTheUseOfHook: A letter from the port approving the use of the hook
admissionForm.rovalOfPayment: The company's acknowledgment/approval of payment of expenses and fees
admissionForm.acknowledgmentFromTheAuthorizedPerson: An acknowledgment from the authorized person that the shipment will not be unloaded except in the presence of a representative from the competent branch of the agency
admissionForm.letterFromThePortApprovingTheUseOfTheHoo: A letter from the port approving the use of the hook

validation.passwordValidation: password must contain minimum 8 characters, at least one upper case English letter , at least one lower case English letter, one number and one special character

endorsement.generalChairmanDirectors: Mr. Major General / Chairman of the Board of Directors
endorsement.frameworkOfCooperation: Within the framework of cooperation between
endorsement.applicationSubmitted: And the Environmental Affairs Agency, and with reference to the application submitted by the company
endorsement.environmentalAffairsAgency: To the Environmental Affairs Agency on
endorsement.toBenefitFronTheAgency: To benefit from the agency’s opinion regarding unloading a coal shipment.
endorsement.expectedToArriveAtPort: which is expected to arrive at the port
endorsement.shipmentInformation: The shipment information is as follows:
endorsement.amendmentToTheExecutiveRegulations: With reference to the amendment to the executive regulations issued by Prime Minister’s Decision No. (964) of 2015 and its amendments No. (544) of 2016 and (618) of 2017 regarding the Environmental Law No. (4) of 1994 (Appendix No. 12 regarding standards and requirements for the circulation and use of coal or petroleum )
endorsement.noObjection: The Environmental Affairs Agency has no objection to establishing a company.
endorsement.unloadingACargoOfCoal: By unloading a cargo of coal
endorsement.referredToAboveManner: referred to above in a manner
endorsement.portAuthorityObligates: provided that the Port Authority obligates the company
endorsement.controls: With the controls, requirements and standards contained in Environmental Law No. (4) of 1994 and its amendments and the Executive Regulations and its amendments issued by Prime Minister’s Decision No. (964) of 2015 (Appendix 12 regarding standards and requirements for the handling and use of coal or petroleum coal) during unloading and transport work, provided that we are kindly notified of the unloading date.” The shipment so that the agency can send a representative to follow up on the trading activities of the aforementioned shipment.
endorsement.note: Noting that the company paid the administrative expenses and fees for the coal shipment mentioned above on the date of
endorsement.environmentalProtectionFund: This is according to what was received from the Environmental Protection Fund to the Coal or Petroleum Coal Unit on
endorsement.asDecided: As decided in accordance with the Prime Minister’s Decision No. (964) of 2015 and specified by the Decision of the Professor, Dr./Minister of the Environment No. (61) of 2016 and amended by Resolution No. (365) of 2019, Resolution (161) of 2022, and Ministerial Resolution No. (49) of 2021.
endorsement.generalAdministration: A copy submitted to the General Administration of Alexandria Customs
endorsement.TheDestination: The destination from which the shipment is received
endorsement.companyCarrying: The company carrying out unloading/storage/transportation work
endorsement.typeAndPurpose: The type of coal and the purpose it is used for
endorsement.importer: The party for whose benefit the importer is importing
endorsement.twoCoalUnitsSupervisor: Supervisor of the two coal units
